song.title: Thank You Jesus
song.lyrics:
[1] .G Grace that flows like a river .D C G Washing over me .G Fount of heaven, love of Christ .D C G Overflow in me
[C] . C G Thank You Jesus, You set me free . C G Christ my Saviour, You rescued me|| --- [2] .G Take this life delivered . D C G A vessel of Your love .G Wholly now devoted . D C G To see Your Kingdom come
[Interlude] .C D Em G/B C D Em G
[B] .C You've given me life .D You've opened my eyes .Em I love You Lord .G/B I love You Lord || .C You've entered my heart .D You've set me apart .Em I love You Lord .G I love You Lord
